abstract: Asks the delegate which section of the toolbar to host the navigation bar in.

declaration.code: @MainActor optional func navigationBarNSToolbarSection(_ navigationBar: UINavigationBar) -> UINavigationBar.NSToolbarSection

overview:
## Return Value

An [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/AppKit/NSToolbar] section that determines which section to place the navigation bar in, and how to present the navigation bar in that section. Return [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UINavigationBar/NSToolbarSection/none] to disable [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/AppKit/NSToolbar] hosting, which is equivalent to setting [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UINavigationBar/preferredBehavioralStyle] to [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIBehavioralStyle/pad].

## Discussion

The system calls this method to determine how to render your [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UINavigationBar] when you build your app with Mac Catalyst.

# navigationBarNSToolbarSection(_:)

**Instance Method**

Asks the delegate which section of the toolbar to host the navigation bar in.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor optional func navigationBarNSToolbarSection(_ navigationBar: UINavigationBar) -> UINavigationBar.NSToolbarSection
```

## Parameters

- **navigationBar**: The navigation bar to host in an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/AppKit/NSToolbar].

## Return Value

An [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/AppKit/NSToolbar] section that determines which section to place the navigation bar in, and how to present the navigation bar in that section. Return [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UINavigationBar/NSToolbarSection/none] to disable [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/AppKit/NSToolbar] hosting, which is equivalent to setting [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UINavigationBar/preferredBehavioralStyle] to [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIBehavioralStyle/pad].

## Discussion

The system calls this method to determine how to render your [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UINavigationBar] when you build your app with Mac Catalyst.
